allow: Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.4.0/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "paquetes <- c(''shiny'', ''shinydashboard'', ''readxl'', ''dplyr'', ''ggplot2'', ''plotly'', ''lubridate'', ''DT''); instalados <- sapply(paquetes, function(p) requireNamespace(p, quietly = TRUE)); cat(''Paquetes instalados:'', sum(instalados), ''/'', length(paquetes), ''\n''); if (!all(instalados)) { cat(''Faltantes:'', paste(paquetes[!instalados], collapse='', ''), ''\n'') }")

Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.4.0/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "if (!requireNamespace(''rsconnect'', quietly = TRUE)) install.packages(''rsconnect'', repos=''https://cloud.r-project.org'')")
